advancements.tetra.spelunking.geode.desc: Find a Ancient Geode when mining glimmering deepslate
advancements.tetra.spelunking.geode_open: Upgrade a mallet and use it to break open a Ancient Geode at a workbench
advancements.tetra.spelunking.pristine_s: Find a pristine gem in a Ancient Geode and use it to socket a sword or a tool
